EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Partners (1340814036.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 110 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Alan, It was a pleasure speaking with you today. I’m glad to hear you would like to get your account setup and ready to go for your next project. Here are a few important items: · Private informational section about MBO Partners, you can access here <http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-arhancet.html>.o Benefits (401k, Health, Dental, etc)o Sample Contractso Demo of our Business Centero Value of MBO · In addition we have a index of recorded Webinars, white papers and collaterals that talk about the best practices to working independently. You can see them by going here <http://www.mbopartners.com/resources>. · You’ll receive another email with a link to get your account ready. If you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule <https://my.timedriver.com/C9CPC>. As promised I will reach out to you again on July 5th. Best of luck finding your next contract, Steve ___________________________________Steve ArhancetDirector, Consultant ServicesMBO Partners t: 703.793.6011f: 703.793.6081m: 540.560.8837e: sarhancet@mbopartners.com <mailto:sarhancet@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
